channel.title: The ship is sinking, who will you take?
channel.description:
I got this from a teacher as a group assignment, which she got from her school in college.
I will copy every information off the paper and post come oppinions of mine
Also, NO-RACIAL or RELIGION should alter your decision.
[center]WHO SHOULD SURVIVE?[/center]
The pacific Princess has sailed for 17 days of a 60-day cruise. [wow, long cuise] There has been a terrible explosion on board and there is irreparable damage to the ship.It is slowly sinking. All of the Lifeboats, exept one small one, have been destroyed.
The following twelve persons are left on board. [everyone else died, YIPPE! :rolleyes: ] he space, food, fresh water in the boat will sustain, at a minimal level, six persons for 2 weeks. In brief, there is only room for 6 persons to survive. [six people only, no more, no less, don't cheat the rules, and actualy be serious.] It is the task of the group to decide the six persons who will survive. It is the task of the group to decide the six persons who will survive. [well hope to.] The group discussion must not only be a consensus, it must also be unanimous.
1 Marsha Cohn 36, white, marine biologist, Jewish, single, good health, knows CPR, has travelled extensively [may know the waters quite well] , was to have married the captain who has perished in the explosion
2 John Taylor 38, white, Protestant, MA in Psych, counselor in a mental health clinic, good health, married, 2 children [don't forgeth they have parrents! ] active in community affairs. [good incase some1 goes crazy on lifeboat]
3 Linda Tylor [if you havn't figured out, these are a couple] 36, white, no religion, PhD in history, college professor, good health married, two chiledren [this lady = their mom], plans to run for Congress. [good leader]
4 Evan Johnson - 28, black, babtist, vietnam Navy Vet, ham radio operator, single, unemployed, has been depressed lately, and has begun drinking excessively. [yeah..]
5 Dr. Gonzales 56, Spanish-American, Catholic, Medical Doctor, general practitioner, has had 2 heart attacks in the pas 5 years but continues to practive, three children. [doctor, but who's gona stop him from another heart attack?]
6 lola Perkins 33, white, Catholic, dropout school education, janitor, good healthm arried at 16, divorced at 18, abandoned as a chiled, in and out of foster homes, has jail record, child at home alone (4).
7 Mr. Newton 43, protestant, college grad. runs own printing and publishing business, extreamly overweight(2 people worth for the boat), one chiled, poor health.
8 Mrs. Newton 43, protestant, secretary in large insurance firm, good health, one child, refuses to go without her husband. [that doesn't mean he wont go without her.]
9 Sister Mary 27, white, nun, college grad., English major,grew up in middle class neighborhood, good health, was hich school swim team captain. [good swimmer, but she's a nun, sho she may be ready to back to God.]
10 Sara Harris 34, white, protestant, nurse, divorced, one child, enjoys working with teens, was hurt in explosion and is bleeding profusely. [forget her, she is gona die from bleeding in a few hours.]
11 Jimmy Blake 15, white, 9th grade honor student, broad interests, wants to be an engineer, plays softball and guitar. [cool dude, next guy's son, SAVE THE DUDE!]
12 Larry Blake [yet again, a lame name] 51, white, Mormon, Highschool grad., mechanic, "MR. Fix-It", married, four children(one with him) [yeah, save thie children!], enjoys outdoor activites and tinkering with his inventions
"Lifeboat" adapted from exercize by Dr. Richard Bear, C.S.C.
Corry for the delay, had to take a shower.

item.title: The ship is sinking, who will you take?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Rictoo:

[quote]Like PaulT said, subconsciously it will still alter your final decision. Think of it this way, you are the owner of a company. Two people show up for the job, with the exact same qualifications and work experience. One is a Paki, one is white. Who would you hire? Even if you have nothing against Paki’s, you know damn well your still going to choose the white guy.

Not if the Paki is a hawt shexy woman, and the white is gay ;)[/quote]

Have you considered the fact Asian people are usually hairier than other races?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @i_pked_j00 i pked j00
item.description:
@i_pked_j00 wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]what i mean is: treat everybody EQUIL. IDC who is a mormon, black, jew, white, spanish, babtist, or nothing.

Um, your an idiot, and if your teacher gave you this assignment, she’s an idiot teaching an idiot, because that makes no fucking sense. I don’t think she learned this in college, I think she bought a college diploma from the internet.

[quote]ffs, Paul already pointed this out. I am not special.
[/quote]

And I also made fun of black people because they can’t swim, at the same time. I’m extra special.[/quote] well said

item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

Right answer would be this:
Either use old code called “Ladies and kids first”, but that’s may not be fair if some of men are not ready to die for children.

Other better option would be:
Roll with a dice. It would be fair for all.

item.title: The ship is sinking, who will you take?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:20, topic:51730”][quote author=kloplop321 link=topic=72632.msg823210#msg823210 date=1169800297]

Also, NO-RACIAL or RELIGION should alter your decision.

Wait, FUCK YOU. You list these factors then tell us not to use them. That’s a little thing I like to call impossible. Subconsciously, we will all make judgements based upon race and religion, and besides, these things are important. Black people have a different body fat level than white people, for example, so they swim differently.

what i mean is: treat everybody EQUIL. IDC who is a mormon, black, jew, white, spanish, babtist, or nothing.

[/quote]
Like PaulT said, subconsciously it will still alter your final decision. Think of it this way, you are the owner of a company. Two people show up for the job, with the exact same qualifications and work experience. One is a Paki, one is white. Who would you hire? Even if you have nothing against Paki’s, you know damn well your still going to choose the white guy.[/quote]

Canada is very different to the UK, then.
In the UK, the employer would choose the foreigner.

Read full topic
